description: Gracia Hughes is the kind-hearted wife of http://anidb.net/ch6590 [Maes Hughes] and mother of http://anidb.net/ch10890 [Elicia Hughes]. In the 2003 anime series, http://anidb.net/ch5885 [Edward Elric], http://anidb.net/ch5908 [Alphonse Elric] and http://anidb.net/ch10888 [Nina Tucker] helped Gracia get through her delivery of the baby by being there for her. At the time Edward heats some water for Gracia without a Transmutation circle. Gracia is very kind throughout the series and sometimes makes cakes and sweets for the Elric brothers.
name: Gracia Hughes
